Reach Chamber Website's Target Audience

Description

The Reach Chamber's website is designed around managing the chamber itself and communicating information. Its main audience is entrepreneur who own business, both members of the chamber and those seeking to be members, and consumers.

Personas

  1. Entrepreneur

    • Name: Remy Crowther
    • Owns a small local business and would like to begin networking and expanding his business new ways.
    • Uses the website to sign up for the chamber and undergo the admissions process.

  2. Consumer

    • Name: Everly Keeling
    • Cares deeply about supporting small local businesses and hopes to find a business with rewards for regular customers.
    • Uses the website to read about local businesses and find the URLs to their sites for more information.

Scenarios

  • Consumer: I want to find a business for {specific problem here}, but I want to support local businesses rather than large corporations. What businesses can solve {my problem here}?
  • I own a business and want to join this chamber. What is the process for doing so?
  • I'm a real estate agency and want to refer my customers to a good local pest control agency. Are there any?
  • I heard the chamber is hosting an event for the public. Where can I find the details about it?
  • I heard there's a chamber in our town and want to learn more for a school project, but I don't have the time to go to a meeting. What information about it can I find online?
